alert.note: Alert for Cache Valley, Utah Portion; Eastern Box Elder County; Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 14 at 11:08PM MST until December 15 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow is expected to continue into the early morning hours prior to tapering. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches valley floors, 5-10 inches benches, with locally higher amounts along the east Benches of Salt Lake and Davis Counties. Northwest wind gusts up to 45 mph locally within Salt Lake and northern Utah Counties will create areas of blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Tooele and Rush Valleys, Eastern Box Elder County, Northern Wasatch Front, Salt Lake Valley, Utah Valley, Cache Valley/Utah Portion and Eastern Juab/Millard Counties. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Significant travel impacts are occurring on all roadways tonight. Slow down and allow more time to reach your destinations. Roads may appear to be snow covered, but may have an ice layer underneath. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heavy at times snowfall will continue tonight and into the early morning hours Wednesday prior to tapering. This will make the Wednesday morning commute along the Wasatch Front, Cache Valley and I- 15 corridor from Nephi to Beaver difficult.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.
